original_prompt.prompt: Create a compelling product description for a new eco-friendly water bottle. Highlight its sustainable features and unique selling points.

clarity.description: Evaluation of prompt clarity and specificity
suggestions: Add more detailed requirements for the description length and tone

structure.description: Assessment of reasoning flow and organization
suggestions: Organize the prompt to specify different aspects to cover in the description
Provide an example of a product description for reference
Use bullet points for better readability and organization
Define the expected length and tone of the product description

enhanced_prompt.prompt:
Create a compelling product description for a new eco-friendly water bottle tailored for environmentally conscious consumers. The description should be approximately 150-200 words and highlight the following:
- Sustainable features (e.g., materials used, recyclability)
- Unique selling points (e.g., design, usability)
- Target audience considerations
Please present the description in a clear and engaging tone.

clarity.description: Evaluation of prompt clarity and specificity
suggestions: Clarity has been improved with more specific details

structure.description: Assessment of reasoning flow and organization
suggestions: The flow has been reorganized for better logical progression
More relevant examples have been added to illustrate the points
Markdown formatting has been improved for better readability
The expected output format has been clarified

enhanced_prompt.highlighted_prompt: The enhanced prompt has tailored for environmentally conscious consumers that was not present in the original prompt, such as [specific new elements]. Additionally, several parts of the original prompt have been polished for better accuracy and refinement, including approximately 150-200 words and highlight the following: Sustainable features (e.g., materials used, recyclability), Unique selling points (e.g., design, usability), Target audience considerations. Overall, the enhanced prompt provides a clearer and more structured approach to the task.
